output.sentences: I a trying to pick a city to take my vacation.
I want to pick somewhere that I can get a manicure.
But also somewhere safe, preferably with an embassy where I can register.
I also have to be prepared with a list of country codes for placing phone calls back home.
And I want ther to be numerous options for dinner.
